article:
Events and trends *

Significant people *1368 BCâDeath of Erichthonius, mythical King of Dardania.
*1366 BCâBirth of Princess Tadukhipa to Tusratta, King of Mitanni and his Queen
Juni. She will be later married to Amenhotep III and after his death to his son
and heir Amenhotep IV Akhenaton. She is variously identified with Akhenaton's
Queens Nefertiti and Kiya. *1365 BCâAshur-uballit I rises to the throne on
Assyria. *c. 1365 BCâThe Citadel of Tiryns, Greece, is built. *1362 BCâBirth of
the later Pharaoh Amenhotep IV Akhenaton to Amenhotep III and his Queen Tiy.
